questions.question: How does the partner program work?
questions.answer: We offer an advanced partner program that allows you to earn commissions when promoting our services. After registration, you'll get a unique referral link to share with your audience.

questions.question: How can I create a customer dashboard?
questions.answer: You can create a customized customer dashboard by going to your account settings, then selecting "Dashboard" and customizing it according to your needs.

questions.question: How can I delete my account?
questions.answer: To delete your account, go to account settings, choose "Account Management", then click on "Delete Account". All your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days.

questions.question: How can I invite people via referral link?
questions.answer: You can share your referral link through the "Referrals" section in your account. Everyone who registers through your link gets a special discount and you earn a commission.

questions.question: Is the app available for iPhone?
questions.answer: Yes, our app is available for download on the Apple Store for iOS devices. You can search for the app name in the App Store and install it on your device.
